text: Neolepetopsis verruca is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Neolepetopsidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== East Pacific Rise near 21° N. == Habitat == a sulphide chimney ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neolepetopsidae Category:Gastropods described in 1990
title: Neolepetopsis verruca
